About.Hours & facilities: Open Mon-Thurs 10am--9pm, Fri 10am-6pm, Sat and Sun 10am-5pm. Reference and research assistance available. General copying services available in person. Private research available. Fee $85.00/hr.

About.Access: Open access to general collection. Restricted access to community archives. On line access to books, serials, photos, maps, newspapers.

About.Acquisition focus: History and development of municipality of Ku-ring-gai.

About.Major holdings: 1,450 photographs. 1,400 maps. Community organisation archives. Thompson, Spooner and Dixon house plans.
